newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Plessey wins Eastern Europe meter contract.
newsitem.headline: Plessey wins Eastern Europe meter contract.

text.p: South African electronics group Plessey Corp Ltd has landed an order to supply Eastern Europe with pre-payment electricity meters, a contract that will be worth eight million rand in the first year.
It said in a statement on Wednesday that this was in line with its aim to secure 30 percent of its earnings in export orders.
The deal involves the transfer of technology for the manufacture of pre-payment meters and vending systems and technical assistance to adapt the technology to local conditions.
Plessey will initially supply completed meters and vending systems and later knockdown kits.
